name: LFlash Flashlight - LED
description: LFlash Flashlight uses the camera flash LED on your device to turn it into a useful flashlight, LFlash flashlight also offers more functionality than a common flashlight, as it has Strobe and SOS (an international code for help) mode. And remember, LFlash flashlight is free.  LFlash Flashlight features:  - Flashlight. - Strobe with 9 frequencies. - S.O.S (international code for help). - Turns on when you open the App. - Prevents screen lock to prevent the flashlight turns off. - Battery indicator. - Clock.  2 modes:  - Advanced Flashlight (all the functions mentioned) - Simple Flashlight (only static light)   Warning: some people may be sensitive to flashing lights.
